description: Try our easy to follow Mixed Fish Kebabs recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Mixed Fish Kebabs Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 150g salmon, steaks or fillets, cut into cubes
2 cloves garlic, grated or finely chopped
1 piece fresh root ginger, 5 cm piece, finely chopped

recipeInstructions.text: If using wooden or bamboo skewers, soak in cold water for at least 30 minutes first. Put all the ingredients in a large bowl, and season with salt and black pepper. Using your hands, carefully combine everything until well mixed. Keep in the refrigerator until needed.

Heat the barbecue or charcoal grill until hot. Thread the fish chunks onto the skewers in alternating pieces. Grill over a high heat for about 3 minutes on each side, turning only once during cooking. Serve hot.
